Reviews.Title: Phone does not work outside of US
Reviews.Author: Judy
Reviews.Content: Phone does not contain Wi Fi and is network locked although the sim is unlocked. It also does not connect to networks using EDGE. It cannot be used outside of the US although it states that it is a GSM World Edition phone and it is unlocked.

Reviews.Title: Its OK
Reviews.Author: Habachi00
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone for a relative in southern Africa, however he ran into problems trying to add internet to his device, other than that he stated that he is happy with the phone.

Reviews.Title: New correct phone is on the way
Reviews.Author: Michael L Hensley
Reviews.Content: First unit was a Sprint Phone and I needed a AT&T.; I learned from this to get the correct phone from the correct provider. I was not educated on this but realize this AT&T; phones are used on AT&T; accounts. My thanks to Allstar Electronics for correcting for my Ignorance and replacing my purchase with the correct one.
